# cells-step-legal-terms

Component containing inputs for an operation concept and reference

Example:
```html
<cells-step-legal-terms></cells-step-legal-terms>
```

```

## Styling

The following custom properties and mixins are available for styling:

| Custom property | Description     | Default        |
|:----------------|:----------------|:--------------:|
| --cells-step-legal-terms-scope      | scope description | default value  |
| --cells-step-legal-terms  | empty mixin     | {}             |
| --cells-step-legal-terms-full  | empty mixin     | {}             |
| --cells-step-legal-terms-filled-p  | empty mixin     | {}             |
| --cells-step-legal-terms-secondary-input  | empty mixin     | {}             |
| --cells-step-legal-terms-btn-primary  | empty mixin     | {}             |
